activities: BillingOrchard is a product owned by GrowthOrchard, LLC, which provides online billing for small businesses.  BillingOrchard customers subscribe to the services, so they may enter their company information, client's contact information, invoices and payments received.  Companies in the EU may store the following data on our servers: invoices, client contact information, payments made by clients, current billing information for clients, detailed project information, company logo, and public company news.
eucountries: Ireland, Austria, Italy, Belgium, Luxembourg, Denmark, Netherlands, Finland, Portugal, France, Spain, Germany, Sweden, Greece, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Currently we are not in any privacy programs.
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
